features: One 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Very Emollient Unscented Original Body Lotion
Hydrates and nourishes normal to dry or sensitive skin while providing hydration
Made with a plant-based and hypo-allergenic blend of fragrance-free botanical ingredients
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Moisturize and nourish sensitive skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Original Unscented Body Lotion. Made with botanical emollients such as shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil, this rich lotion hydrates and softens dry skin without a heavy or greasy feeling. Aloe, cucumber extract and chamomile soothe and calm skin. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Original Unscented Body Lotion Moisturize and nourish sensitive skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Original Unscented Body Lotion. Made with botanical emollients such as shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil, this rich lotion hydrates and softens dry skin without a heavy or greasy feeling. Aloe, cucumber extract and chamomile soothe and calm skin. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion Very Emollient Original Body Lotion Very Emollient Herbal Healing Body Lotion Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion More Very Emollient Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Botanicals such as aloe vera, green tea and chamomile are combined with antioxidants and alpha hydroxy acids to relieve dry, irritated skin. Made with botanical emollients such as shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil, this rich lotion hydrates and softens dry skin without a heavy or greasy feeling. Made with 0.4% colloidal oatmeal, our rich lotion soothes and calms inflamed, damaged skin. This rich, creamy lotion is made with virgin, unrefined coconut oil and coconut milk to nourish and intensely hydrate skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite body lotion ever
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this body lotion for years. The quality has not changed, which I appreciate. It’s unscented and does not irritate sensitive skin or noses. It’s thick, but not too thick, and a little goes a long way. Does not feel greasy and rubs in easily. This is a great lotion for the price (I would pay more for it, but don’t tell).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday lotion
reviews.reviewText: I have used this lotion for years and for me it's the top for quality and value. It doesn't have any real fragrance to speak of. The texture is thick and creamy and it goes on smoothly. I like to use it everyday directly from the shower. It leaves your skin feeling cleanly moisturized, you do have to work to rub it in fully but it only takes a couple of seconds and then there is no residue or stickiness once it's absorbed. It works great for me in both super dry and humid climates. No frills but a great everyday product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good... Has Shea Butter
reviews.reviewText: Good lotion, large bottle, good price, no actual scent, besides for a hint of shea butter. If you do not like shea butter, regardless of the almost zero scent, you will notice it. I use this lotion to extend the smell of my very expensive perfume collection and my perfume easily eliminates even the slightest hint of shea. This is a cheaper method rather than spending another $120 on the additional body lotion for my scents. If you want to be completely scentless (not possible/your body gives off a natural scent), avoid products with shea butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is amazing! It is very moisturizing and great for sensitive skin types. Several allergies in our house and this is a lotion everyone can use :) I personally like to mix a little Body Cream from Bath & Body with it. This lotion is thick, so it thins it a bit and gives you some scent if you so desire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great unscented lotion but difficult to open
reviews.reviewText: I have used this unscented product for years and love it on my skin. It has a good value for your money as well. The only problem is that it is too hard to release the pump valve which is locked upon delivery. Turning the head in the direction of the arrow does nothing. I had to open it and use a wrench to hold the inner grooved portion (covered in lotion) and then turn the pump head very hard. It only opened with brute force. Alba needs to re-evaluate their pumps and fix this problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this lotion for years and it’s the best thing that helps my skin in the dry desert climate I live in. I have very sensitive skin and most products irritate me and turn me red. Not this. I even use it on my face. No, it doesn’t break me out which I am prone to. It moisturizes without any greasy feeling or shine. Can’t recommend it enough. If you have sensitive skin or alcohol allergy like I do, this product is great. Cheap too compared to face creams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent basic body lotion and base for essential oils
reviews.reviewText: I got this product specifically to blend with assorted essential oils since i have sensitive skin but love fragrance. I fill a tiny glass jar with the lotion and add a drop or two of essential oil (currently pine and bergamot for winter). It blends beautifully and doesn't separate over the course of a few days.The lotion itself is moisturizing but not at all sticky. It absorbs quickly and I haven't noticed any transfer onto clothing or bedding. I'll be getting the larger size next time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i have very sensitive skin on my shins. this is working fine. can apply 3x a day, and it has no bad effects.

reviews.reviewTitle: Absorbs well and has a balanced moisturizing effect
reviews.reviewText: The consistency of this lotion allows a perfect balance of slide and tackiness. It doesn't gum up and absorbs easily. I only every buy the unscented as the original version has a strong perfume to it

Como varias de las reseñas mencionan, el olor sí no es tan agradable, pero con poquita crema tengo para que me deje la piel humectada. Aparte de que me la deja super suave. Si está un poco cara, pero me ha durado bastante. La volveré a comprar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: a uniquely effective body cream made by all natural ingredients
reviews.reviewText: This is a great body cream very good for dry skin. It is easily absorbed and not greasy. Skin is left supple and soft. I have been using for several years and will undoubtedly continue.
El producto cumple sus funciones, hidrata bien tu piel y lo deja suave.
Excellent product. Very emollient. Blends superbly with my essential oils. Little to no scent.
